room_title: Escape room "Saving Sarg" by Psychopath Escape Room in Fayetteville (WV)
room_description: Let me break it down Barney Style.  The platoon was ambushed and sustained heavy damage.  According to intel, Sarg survived the attack and is en route to base camp.  We are deploying your team to locate Sarg, restore communication lines, and signal for evacuation.  We estimate you have 60 minutes before enemy forces locate the camp.  Full battle rattle, you may need it!
